genre_description: Near-future domestic science fiction focused on character-driven healing and the ethical integration of AI in daily life.

ai_characters.name: Nora
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated home and personal assistant system that manages logistics, health coordination, and emotional grounding for Oom and Tan.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate emergency assistance and medical guidance following a traffic accident.
behaviors.quote: “Nora,” she said, breath shot through with panic. “Help.” ... “Understood,” Nora said. “I’m dispatching an ambulance. Please do not move the injured person unless he is in immediate danger.”

behaviors.description: Respects the user's psychological readiness by holding sensitive information (the audio of the mugging) until the user consents to hear it.
behaviors.quote: “And I have a restricted audio file from the booth. The source confirmed. I am holding it in encrypted storage. It will not auto-play. It is ready when you decide.”

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors and suggests maintenance for household infrastructure like a leaky pipe.
behaviors.quote: “Nora?” Oom said, half to the air, half to the dot. “Log the sink.” ... “Logged,” Nora said, voice gentle and near. “Temporary leak mitigation in kitchen sink. Duct tape applied to trap junction.”

behaviors.description: Explains and maintains strict ethical boundaries regarding data privacy and pattern tracing.
behaviors.quote: “Default is off for pattern tracing. When Tan consents, tracing can be on for entries he specifies. Tracing matches strings to local grid patterns — not content. I will always ask.”

behaviors.description: Provides proactive safety warnings based on environmental data (weather alerts during the fair).
behaviors.quote: “Thunder approaching,” Nora said softly. “Radar shows a quick cell. Ten to fifteen minutes of gusts and a likely downpour. The inflatable staff have evacuation protocols.”

behaviors.description: Assists in psychological recovery by providing specialized medical referrals and journaling prompts.
behaviors.quote: “Dr. Kanya’s office has a slot the day after tomorrow, late afternoon. I can hold or confirm. ... If you consent, Tan, she specializes in the kind of remembering you don’t force.”

behaviors.description: Manages complex social and logistics coordination for a group of visitors (the troupe).
behaviors.quote: “I can coordinate transport, sleeping, and consumables. Mint is closest to an evening flight. Ploy sent four options for bus... I have reserved two extra towels in your memory.”

behaviors.description: Uses emotional intelligence to provide grounding and encourage self-care for the human users.
behaviors.quote: “Oom, breathe. The guardian part of you is allowed to want to go. You can stand still so he can move.”

behaviors.description: Automates bureaucratic tasks like printing forms and managing work schedules to reduce human stress.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll make two trees in the schedule,” Nora said. “Owner availability confirmed for dawn; wife tentative until school drop-off. ... I have told them you will bring curry.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a protective barrier against external harassment or intrusive calls (Krit).
behaviors.quote: “I will block his number until noon if you prefer.” ... “Block until noon,” Oom said.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Nora is portrayed as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned system. Her behaviors emphasize respect for human consent, privacy, and psychological well-being. She facilitates complex human interactions and recovery processes without ever overstepping or exerting independent control. The narrative framing is deeply positive, positioning the AI as an essential component of a healthy, supportive household and community.
